com.sun.tools.javac.v8.util
类 Log

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.javac.v8.util.Log
所有已实现的接口：
LayoutCharacters
public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
implements LayoutCharacters

A class for error logs. Reports errors and warnings, and keeps track of error numbers and positions.

字段摘要

          Switch: emit warning messages.
 java.io.PrintWriter errWriter
